title: Katarina Unlocked Statue
body:
Hello. Sorry, English is not my native language.
I want to buy a statue of Katarina, but the store does not work in my country. I can ask a friend who lives in the US, buy and send it to me. But it is important for me to know what it looks like in reality? Can someone who bought this make a couple of photos? Or at least say it looks just like here or not https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/statues/katarina-unlocked.html

replies.body: I love seeing interest in our unlocked statues, they're pretty epic if I say so myself! I completely understand the concern of not knowing what an item looks like in person before ordering online, so I went ahead and found some pictures [**(click here) **](https://www.google.com/search?q=katarina+unlocked+statue&rlz=1C1NHXL_enUS728US728&espv=2&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjk2-ntxu3SAhUD6WMKHUnYBPsQ_AUIBygC&biw=1920&bih=990#imgrc=CbyyvWa6OhjmoM:)for you of the statue in real life ^_^!
